title: PLEASE I Am tired and i need help
body:
I cannot play league of legends, I just got a new computer and It is telling me I have an "Unkown directx error" I have literally tried everything to solve it please help riot.

Radeon rx tm 480

AmD fx 4300 Quad core

Directx V12

PLease help

replies.body: This happens to me all the time as well.. It has even happened after I have played a game. Sometimes deleting the game.cfg file and then restarting my computer helps. It is very frustrating. I always check in a custom first just to be sure.

Hey there, sorry about the crashing issues you've been having I can certainly imagine it would be really tiring!  This usually happens with outdated drivers or other issues like an oudated OS.  Since you have a new computer, you definitely want to make sure these are all up to date.  I also recommend going over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help out with this and troubleshoot.  I hope that helps!
